backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing emergency services tracking with user profiles (ambulance/police roles), location tracking, SOS alerts, GPS distance calculations, heartbeat monitoring, and role-based access control using authorization mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting two high-confidence features: investigating profile loading errors after authentication and adding improved error handling/logging for profile operations.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of frontend files describing enhanced error handling, authorization vs network error distinction, GPS smoothing, Leaflet integration, and UI components for ambulance/police interfaces.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH color system defining light/dark theme variables including emergency-red and emergency-blue colors for the emergency services aesthetic.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading Leaflet CSS/JS from CDN with integrity checks, onload/onerror handlers for logging, and verification script to confirm window.L availability.
frontend/project_state.json: Project state file documenting known issue ISSUE-1: transient production deployment errors that typically resolve by waiting 30-60 seconds and retrying.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main application component orchestrating authentication flow, profile loading with enhanced error handling that distinguishes authorization errors (new users) from network/backend errors, and routing to appropriate interfaces (login, profile setup, ambulance, or police).
frontend/src/components/CrashFallback.ts: Error fallback UI component displaying application crash details with technical error information in collapsible section and reload button.
frontend/src/components/ErrorBoundary.ts: React error boundary class component catching component errors, logging detailed error information, and rendering CrashFallback UI when errors occur.
frontend/src/components/ErrorState.tsx: Displays a full-screen error state with contextual hints for network, auth, and backend errors, plus expandable technical details and retry/reload buttons.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders a simple footer with copyright notice and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Displays app header with branding, user profile badge (name and role), logout button, and controls for sharing and domain info.
frontend/src/components/LinkDomainInfoPa: Modal dialog explaining the app's shareable URL, custom domain setup requirements, and troubleshooting tips for production publish failures.
Full-screen loading spinner with optional message, used as a suspense fallback.
frontend/src/components/LoginPrompt.tsx: Landing page prompting unauthenticated users to log in via Internet Identity, showing ambulance and police role icons.
frontend/src/components/PhoneNumberCaptu: Form for existing users to add or update their phone number, validating 10-digit format and preserving existing profile name and role.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Onboarding form for new users to enter name, phone number, and select role (ambulance or police) with validation.
frontend/src/components/RealtimeMap.tsx: Leaflet-based real-time map component that displays ambulance, police, and SOS markers with smooth coordinate transitions and in-place marker updates to avoid re-rendering.
frontend/src/components/ShareAppLinkCont: Button component that copies the app share URL to clipboard with fallback UI for browsers that don't support the Clipboard API.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance with Internet Identity authentication and admin token initialization.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminTokenInitiali: Hook that initializes admin access control once per session using a token from URL parameters when actor and identity are ready.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity persistence, and delegation validation.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, ambulance locations, SOS alerts, and police locations with automatic refetch intervals.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light/dark themes, emergency color palette, and gradient backgrounds.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query, Internet Identity provider, and renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/AmbulanceInterface.ts: Ambulance interface page with SOS trigger/deactivate functionality, real-time GPS tracking with accuracy filtering and smoothing, and map display showing location updates every 12 seconds.
frontend/src/pages/PoliceInterface.tsx: Police interface page displaying all ambulance locations and active SOS alerts with real-time GPS tracking, filtering by online/offline status, distance calculations, and navigation links to Google Maps.
frontend/src/types/leaflet-global.d.ts: TypeScript declaration file that adds type definitions for the global Leaflet object (window.L) used for map rendering.
frontend/src/utils/getShareUrl.ts: Utility function that returns the full shareable URL of the current browser location including origin, pathname, search, and hash.
frontend/src/utils/leafletMarkers.ts: Leaflet marker utilities providing icon configurations and creation functions for ambulance, police, and SOS marker types with consistent styling and sizing.
frontend/src/utils/locationRefresh.ts: Shared constants for location update intervals (12s for ambulances, 5s for police), police radius (50m), and formatting functions for displaying distances and radii.
frontend/src/utils/locationSmoothing.ts: GPS location smoothing utilities using Haversine distance calculations, low-pass filtering, outlier detection, and accuracy thresholds to reduce jitter and improve coordinate accuracy for both map display and backend updates.
frontend/src/utils/mapsDirections.ts: Utility function that builds Google Maps directions URLs for navigation with optional origin coordinates, defaulting to user's current location.
frontend/src/utils/phoneValidation.ts: Phone number validation utilities that check for exactly 10 digits, normalize input to digits only, and provide user-friendly validation error messages.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: URL parameter parsing utilities supporting both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence for maintaining state like admin tokens across navigation.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration file that defines custom color schemes using OKLCH color space, container settings, border radius variables, animations for accordions, and includes typography, container queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Project state metadata tracking a fix request for a profile loading error after authentication, with existing features for investigating the error and improving error handling/logging, plus a pending requirement to verify backend getUserProfile functionality.
